issue.title: [Website] Write blog post about C++ endianness compatibility
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11698](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11698). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It might be nice to announce the cross-endian compatibility effort on the website.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11698?focusedCommentId=17287755) by Kazuaki Ishizaki (kiszk):*
Sounds good.

It would be nice to add big-endian support on Java, too. This is because our community do not announce it while Arrow 3.0 includes the feature. What do you think?
